resources.string: The purest and strongest form of coffee, \n it is an Italian invention and is the basis \n of all the various coffee styles.
It’s easy to make a strong espresso at home. Just add a spoonful of your coffee to one-fourth hot water in a mug and stir. \nAdd sugar to taste.
Add a shot of espresso to a mug. Fill it with steaming water and stir for a strong cup of Americano. \nAdd sugar to taste.
Just add one-third espresso in a mug along with one-third chocolate syrup and one-third steamed milk. \nSprinkle with chocolate.
To enjoy a delicious Flat White at home, just add a shot of espresso directly into half a mug of hot milk.
Fill a mug with hot frothed milk. Add sugar to taste. Now slowly dribble in a shot of espresso to create a layered effect. Spoon some milk foam over your coffee and enjoy!

Take two cups of water and add 2 spoonful of coffeeand sugar. Let it chill in the fridge. Now pour the chilled coffee, half a cup of vanilla ice cream and 3-4 ice cubes in a blender and blend until frothy. Pour into glass and serve. Enjoy the perfect summer coffee!
A cappuccino differs from a caffè latte in that it is prepared with much less steamed or textured milk than the caffè latte.

Add a shot of espresso to one-third milk and one-third thick creamy milk froth. Dust it with chocolate sprinkles and enjoy a delicious cup of cappuccino with thick foam and rich aroma right at home or everywhere you want!
Pour creamy steamed milk over a shot of espresso. Add a dollop of frothed milk on the top. Mix sugar and stir to enjoy a warm cup of Caffe Latte.
